entry.title:
[SQ] Online banking security: how?
What are the actual, _realistic_ threats you have
entry.content:
Online banking security: how?
What are the actual, _realistic_ threats you have to deal when banking through mobile apps? Is there real potential for half a mil to get transferred out of my brokerage account because I was using a slightly too old version of android?
I'm not worried about credit cards, because you have over a month to notice and take care of it. It's the idea of losing everything that really spooks me.
